title: The Green Way Outdoors
overview: Kyle Green travels the world with his best friends hunting for wild game and dynamic conservation stories. Join Kyle on his extreme hunting and fishing adventures as he breaks the shackles of the modern world and gains a deeper understanding of where our food comes from. Learn about the conservation of exciting species like Buffalo, Moose, and Alligatorâ€”but also learn about the damaging effects of non-native invasive species like Asian Carp, Snakehead, and Pythons. Just know, every species Kyle targets will be prepared in his studio kitchen with a tasty recipe!
